name: Tali 2000 Game System
description:
Billy hasn't seen his dad in over a year. One day he received a package in the mail. It's his dad's old game system and a cartridge called "Cthulhu's Capture." Help Billy with his quest to beat the game!

Controls: Use ASWD in indoor scenes along with the mouse. Outdoor scenes, use 'E' to interact with objects. Click on 'Exit' signs or doors to leave or enter places. In outdoor scenes, hit the 'spacebar' to jump.

Feel free to leave any feedback.

Thanks for playing!

- Mastacasta
